title: Is the Samsung Galaxy S20 Plus worth buying? - Quora

response.answer_text: Samsung Galaxy S20 Plus: filtration confirms denomination and lenses Filtration reveals the new Samsung Galaxy S20 Plus phone  With the Samsung Unpacked just around the corner, the cloud of speculation had begun to fly over our heads: what would the new phone called to replace the Galaxy S10 be called? Initially we had opted for a sequence nomenclature, and we expected a Galaxy S11 . But it seems that it will not be so: the latest rumors were true and the Koreans would have opted for a jump in the sequence, baptizing the company's new flagship as Samsung Galaxy S20, according to a leak published by XDA-Developers. see also ANDROID Malware On Google Play Store In it you can see a capture of the device boot and on an infinite screen full of fingerprints (it is seen that it has passed through several hands), we can clearly read “S20” in addition to “5G”, which would confirm a variant of the device with This network support. But perhaps the most interesting thing about this filtration - always considered with caution, since there is no official confirmation - we find it in the part of the lens and its optics. Samsung Galaxy S20 Plus CONFIRMED VIDEO read more
